text: Here's what specs you'll need on your PC to run Horizon Forbidden West. After its announcement back in September, PlayStation finally announced the Horizon Forbidden West PC system requirements ahead of its launch later this month. As this game includes the PS5-exclusive Burning Shores DLC, it follows that the system requirements are pretty high if you want to run it at higher graphics settings and resolution. Interestingly, the minimum requirements are pretty generous, though you’ll have to play at the Very Low preset and at 720p (which won’t be the best experience). Horizon Forbidden West Complete Edition will be released on PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store on March 21, 2024.
